abstract: How the Occupy Wall Street protests are distributed throughout the United States may reveal something about the political orientation of the protesters.
snippet: How the Occupy Wall Street protests are distributed throughout the United States may reveal something about the political orientation of the protesters.
lead_paragraph: The nascent movement known as Occupy Wall Street had its largest single day of protests on Saturday. And a funny thing happened: most of the action was far from Wall Street itself.

headline.main: The Geography of Occupying Wall Street (and Everywhere Else)
